pages.text: You will have it easy to obtain and dry kelp being a $(turtlemancer): $(br) $(li)Obtain $(item)Kelp$() with the $(l)$(l:spells/apprentice_spells#kelp_collector)Kelp Collector$() spell.$(br) $(li)Turn it to $(item)Dried Kelp$() with $(l)$(l:turtlemy/turtlemy_101)Turtlemy
